alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 7:26AM EDT until March 25 at 9:53PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Blue River at Fredericksburg affecting Harrison and Washington Counties. .Heavy rain from the past 24 hours has caused the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Blue River at Fredericksburg. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Water covers parts of Fredericksburg-Depauw Road near river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 21.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.6 feet on 04/20/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=lmk Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued this evening.
